title: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos
text:
Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos US captain Megan Rapinoe lifts the World Cup trophy after the United States defeated the Netherlands 2-0 in the World Cup Final in Lyon, France on Sunday, July 7. This is the second straight World Cup title for the US team and fourth overall -- two more than any other country. Hide Caption 1 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Los Angeles Lakers guard Codi Miller-McIntyre falls to the ground during an NBA Summer League game against the Los Angeles Clippers in Las Vegas, Nevada, on Saturday, July 6. Hide Caption 2 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Clint Bowyer (14), Alex Bowman (88), Kyle Busch (18), Kyle Larson (42), Ryan Preece (47), Martin Truex Jr. (19), Chase Elliott (9), Austin Dillon (3) and Ryan Blaney (12) get caught in a multi-car crash during a NASCAR Cup Series auto race at Daytona International Speedway in Daytona Beach, Florida, on Sunday, July 7. Hide Caption 3 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos 15-year-old US tennis phenom Cori Gauff celebrates winning her third round match at The Championships, Wimbledon, against Polona Hercog of Slovenia in London, England, on Wednesday, June 5. Hide Caption 4 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos The Los Angeles Dodgers' Cody Bellinger, left, is doused with baby powder by teammate Matt Beaty after hitting a solo walk-off home run during the 10th inning of a baseball game against the Arizona Diamondbacks in Los Angeles on Wednesday, July 3. The Dodgers won 5-4. Hide Caption 5 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Mason Crane of Hampshire bowls during Day Three of the Specsavers County Championship Division One cricket match between Somerset and Hampshire in Taunton, England, on Tuesday, July 2. Hide Caption 6 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Brazil teammates Thiago Silva, right, and Richarlison display the Copa América trophy to supporters after defeating Peru in the final match at Maracana Stadium in Rio de Janeiro on Sunday, July 7. Hide Caption 7 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Amanda Nunes, left, kicks Holly Holm in the head, knocking her to the mat during the first round of their bantamweight title fight at UFC 239 in Las Vegas, Nevada, on Saturday, June 6. Hide Caption 8 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos United States teammates Allie Long, left, and Alex Morgan celebrate in the postgame confetti after defeating the Netherlands in the final match of the Women's World Cup in Lyon, France on July 7. Hide Caption 9 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos A tennis fan with hair dyed to resemble a Slazenger tennis ball attends Wimbledon in London, England, on Monday, July 1. Hide Caption 10 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Washington Nationals second baseman Brian Dozier mishandles a ground ball during a baseball game against the Miami Marlins at Nationals Park in Washington, DC, on Thursday, July 4. Hide Caption 11 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Swimmers participate in the annual Lake Zurich crossing in Zurich, Switzerland, on July 3. Hide Caption 12 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Tianna Hawkins of the Washington Mystics rebounds the ball during a game against the Las Vegas Aces at Mandalay Bay Events Center in Las Vegas on July 5. Hide Caption 13 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Australia's Kelsey-Lee Barber competes in the women's javelin competition during the IAAF Diamond League in Lausanne, Switzerland, on July 5. Hide Caption 14 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos US goalkeeper Alyssa Naeher saves a penalty by England's Steph Houghton during their Women's World Cup semifinal match in Lyon, France, on Tuesday, July 2. The save preserved the Americans' 2-1 lead and helped them advance to the World Cup final. Hide Caption 15 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Cameron Davis stands in a bunker at the 9th hole during the first round of the 3M Championship golf tournament at TPC Twin Cities in Blaine, Minnesota, on Thursday, July 4. Hide Caption 16 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Australia's Nick Kyrgios bends over the net during his first round singles match against Australia's Jordan Thompson at Wimbledon in London, England, on Tuesday, July 2. Hide Caption 17 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Sylvia Fowles of the Minnesota Lynx, right, drives to the basket during a WNBA game against the Atlanta Dream in Minneapolis, Minnesota, on July 2. Hide Caption 18 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos A man walks on a slackline during the 7th edition of the European Marmotte Highline Project festival in Lans-en-Vercors, France, on July 4. Hide Caption 19 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Rose Lavelle of the United States competes for a header with Lucy Nicholson of the Netherlands during the Women's World Cup final in Lyon, France, on Sunday, July 7. Hide Caption 20 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Portugal's Luis Sabino Goncalves competes during the Longines Paris Eiffel Jumping competition in Paris, France, on Sunday, July 7. Hide Caption 21 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos A surfer falls from his board at Bronte beach in Sydney, Australia, on Tuesday, July 2. Hide Caption 22 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Alix Klineman of the US competes during the Beach Volleyball World Championships in Hamburg, Germany, on Saturday, July 6. Hide Caption 23 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Lionel Messi of Argentina reacts after losing the Copa América semifinal match to Brazil at Mineirao Stadium on July 2. Messi, one of the world's greatest players, has never won an international trophy with Argentina's senior team. Hide Caption 24 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Marton Fucsovics of Hungary competes during his Wimbledon second round match against Fabio Fognini of Italy at the All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club in London, England, on Thursday, July 4. Hide Caption 25 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos People play soccer at Ipanema Beach in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, on June 30. Hide Caption 26 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Alexander Zverev dives for the ball during his Wimbledon first round match against Jiri Vesely in London, England, on Monday, July 1. Hide Caption 27 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Belgium's Nina Derwael competes in the uneven bars at the European Games in Minsk, Belarus, Sunday, June 30. Hide Caption 28 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Jockeys compete at the historical horse race Palio di Siena in Siena, Italy, on Tuesday, July 2. Hide Caption 29 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Nicholas Pooran of the West Indies bats during a cricket match against Afghanistan at the ICC Cricket World Cup in Leeds, England, on Thursday, July 4. Hide Caption 30 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Marc Marquez of Spain rides during a practice session ahead of the MotoGP Grand Prix Germany in Hohenstein-Ernstthal on Friday, July 5. Hide Caption 31 of 33

Photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Baltimore Orioles pitcher Mychal Givens, right, dives to tag out Tampa Bay Rays' Kevin Kiermaier during the eighth inning of a baseball game in St. Petersburg, Florida, on Wednesday, July 3. Hide Caption 32 of 33
description: Take a look at 33 amazing sports photos from June 30 to July 7.
